WorkItem.Description:
Hi, 
I use this library in PHP 7 to convert file xls and xlsx to CSV file, in the lower version of PHP7 it works perfectly, but in PHP 7 and higher version there is a Fatal Error in Classes/Calculation/Functions.php line 581, because there is a 'break' not in a loop or in a switch context. For use library i delete the break statement inside the line and after it works correctly.

Comments.Message: If you download the develop branch from the official github repo, this was fixed months ago
